hero.name: UWINEZA Ange Marie
hero.tagline: Crafting innovative, user-focused solutions to drive business success.

personal_introduction.description: Hello, I’m UWINEZA Ange Marie, a dedicated Software Developer with a passion for creating innovative, user-centric solutions that empower businesses to succeed. I thrive on transforming ideas into functional, impactful applications that solve real-world challenges.

background_and_interests.description: My journey in software development began with a fascination for problem-solving and technology’s potential to drive change. I’ve built a robust foundation through diverse projects, ranging from web applications to cloud-based systems. Beyond coding, I’m deeply interested in emerging technologies like AI and blockchain, and I enjoy contributing to open-source communities and mentoring aspiring developers. In my free time, I explore tech blogs, experiment with new tools, and engage in collaborative coding initiatives to stay at the forefront of innovation.

skills_and_technologies.description: I bring a versatile skill set to every project, specializing in:

unique_qualities.description: What distinguishes me as a developer is my ability to bridge technical excellence with strategic vision.
unique_qualities.likes: I like crochetting various handmade clothes and as well designing
